title: Taxonomy
description: Holds the collection of tags, categories, keywords, etc that describe content.

keywords.description: A list of keywords. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

topics.description: A list of topics. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

auxiliaries.description: A list of auxiliaries. In the Arc ecosystem, this list is populated by Clavis.

sites.description: A list of site objects or references to them. In the Arc ecosystem, references in this list are denormalized into sites from the arc-site-service.

seo_keywords.description: A list of user-editable manually entered keywords for search purposes. In the Arc ecosystem, these can be generated and saved in source CMS systems, editors, etc.

stock_symbols.description: A list of stock symbols of companies related to this content. In the Arc ecosystem, these can be generated and saved in source CMS systems, editors, etc.
